title: Senior Data Scientist

ROLE PURPOSE & OBJECTIVE
Identify and implement new business opportunities with a strategic and long-term view
Support the cross-sell team through analytics and campaign execution to promote various offers, enable fulfillment and tracking of different metrics
Responsible for timely deployment, execution and housekeeping of all the cross-sell campaigns. Enhances and maintains the campaign management systems from accuracy and completion perspective
Maintain a high level of engagement with business. Periodically prepare and communicate learning from campaigns, to ensures enhancements in campaigns construct, efficiency, execution procedure etc., when required
Engage with business stakeholders to understand their business process and translate business problems into analytical structures and solve using statistical /ML techniques
Initiate analytics projects which have scope of incremental revenue / reducing cost / increased operational efficiency
Create custom reports and presentations accompanied by strong data visualization and storytelling to take necessary data driven actionable
Lead, manage and develop team to drive initiatives and projects that involves building, analysing data sets which are robust and efficient for use across the Digital Bank
